verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

בְּיוֹם־ <WH3117> be-yom- day הַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> ha-Cho-desh month הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <WH7223> ha-ri-Shon On the first בְּאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> be-'e-Chad of the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh; month תָּקִ֕ים <WH6965> ta-Kim shalt thou set up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִשְׁכַּ֖ן <WH4908> mish-Kan the tabernacle אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> 'O-hel of the tent מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> mo-'Ed. of the congregation

וְשַׂמְתָּ֣ <WH7760> ve-sam-Ta And thou shalt put שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> Sham, therein אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark הָעֵד֑וּת <WH5715> ha-'e-Dut; of the testimony וְסַכֹּתָ֥ <WH5526> ve-sak-ko-Ta and cover עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and הָאָרֹ֖ן <WH727> ha-'a-Ron the ark אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with הַפָּרֹֽכֶת׃ <WH6532> hap-pa-Ro-chet. with the vail

וְהֵבֵאתָ֙ <WH935> ve-he-ve-Ta And thou shalt bring אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַשֻּׁלְחָ֔ן <WH7979> hash-shul-Chan, in the table וְעָרַכְתָּ֖ <WH6186> ve-'a-rach-Ta and set in order אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֶרְכּ֑וֹ <WH6187> er-Ko; the things that are to be set in order וְהֵבֵאתָ֙ <WH935> ve-he-ve-Ta upon it and thou shalt bring אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמְּנֹרָ֔ה <WH4501> ham-me-no-Rah, in the candlestick וְהַעֲלֵיתָ֖ <WH5927> ve-ha-'a-lei-Ta and light אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נֵרֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5216> ne-ro-Tei-ha. the lamps

וְנָתַתָּ֞ה <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Tah And thou shalt set אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִזְבַּ֤ח <WH4196> miz-Bach the altar הַזָּהָב֙ <WH2091> haz-za-Hav of gold לִקְטֹ֔רֶת <WH7004> lik-To-ret, for the incense לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark הָעֵדֻ֑ת <WH5715> ha-'e-Dut; of the testimony וְשַׂמְתָּ֛ <WH7760> ve-sam-Ta and put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מָסַ֥ךְ <WH4539> ma-Sach the hanging הַפֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> hap-Pe-tach of the door לַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <WH4908> lam-mish-Kan. to the tabernacle

וְנָ֣תַתָּ֔ה <WH5414> ve-Na-tat-Tah, And thou shalt set אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> miz-Bach the altar הָעֹלָ֑ה <WH5930> ha-'o-Lah; of the burnt offering לִפְנֵ֕י <WH6440> lif-Nei before פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> Pe-tach the door מִשְׁכַּ֥ן <WH4908> mish-Kan of the tabernacle אֹֽהֶל־ <WH168> 'o-hel- of the tent מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> mo-'Ed. of the congregation

וְנָֽתַתָּ֙ <WH5414> ve-na-ta-Ta And thou shalt set אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַכִּיֹּ֔ר <WH3595> hak-ki-Yor, the laver בֵּֽין־ <WH996> bein- between אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> 'O-hel between the tent מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> mo-'Ed of the congregation וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> u-Vein between הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach; and the altar וְנָתַתָּ֥ <WH5414> ve-na-ta-Ta and shalt put שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> sham in it מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> Ma-yim. water

וְשַׂמְתָּ֥ <WH7760> ve-sam-Ta And thou shalt set up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הֶחָצֵ֖ר <WH2691> he-cha-Tzer the court סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> sa-Viv; round about וְנָ֣תַתָּ֔ <WH5414> ve-Na-ta-ta, and hang up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מָסַ֖ךְ <WH4539> ma-Sach the hanging שַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar gate הֶחָצֵֽר׃ <WH2691> he-cha-Tzer. at the court

וְלָקַחְתָּ֙ <WH3947> ve-la-kach-Ta And thou shalt take אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> She-men oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <WH4888> ham-mish-Chah, the anointing וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֥ <WH4886> u-ma-shach-Ta and anoint אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> ham-mish-Kan the tabernacle וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after בּ֑וֹ bo; וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֥ <WH6942> ve-kid-dash-Ta and all that [is] therein and shalt hallow אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> o-To וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all כֵּלָ֖יו <WH3627> ke-Lav it and all the vessels וְהָ֥יָה <WH1961> ve-Ha-yah become קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> Ko-desh. thereof and it shall be holy

וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֛ <WH4886> u-ma-shach-Ta And thou shalt anoint אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> miz-Bach the altar הָעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> ha-'o-Lah of the burnt offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all כֵּלָ֑יו <WH3627> ke-Lav; and all his vessels וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֙ <WH6942> ve-kid-dash-Ta and sanctify אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach, the altar וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach and it shall be an altar קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh most קָֽדָשִֽׁים׃ <WH6944> Ka-da-Shim. holy

וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֥ <WH4886> u-ma-shach-Ta And thou shalt anoint אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַכִּיֹּ֖ר <WH3595> hak-ki-Yor the laver וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כַּנּ֑וֹ <WH3653> kan-No; and his foot וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֖ <WH6942> ve-kid-dash-Ta and sanctify אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853> o-To.

וְהִקְרַבְתָּ֤ <WH7126> ve-hik-rav-Ta And thou shalt bring אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> ba-Nav, and his sons אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> Pe-tach unto the door אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> mo-'Ed; of the congregation וְרָחַצְתָּ֥ <WH7364> ve-ra-chatz-Ta and wash אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> 'o-Tam בַּמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> bam-Ma-yim. them with water

וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ֙ <WH3847> ve-hil-bash-Ta And thou shalt put אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron, upon Aaron אֵ֖ת <WH854> 'et for בִּגְדֵ֣י <WH899> big-Dei garments הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> hak-Ko-desh; the holy וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֥ <WH4886> u-ma-shach-Ta and anoint אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> o-To וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֥ <WH6942> ve-kid-dash-Ta him and sanctify אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To וְכִהֵ֥ן <WH3547> ve-chi-Hen him that he may minister unto me in the priest's office לִֽי׃ Li.

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בָּנָ֖יו <WH1121> ba-Nav his sons תַּקְרִ֑יב <WH7126> tak-Riv; And thou shalt bring וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ֥ <WH3847> ve-hil-bash-Ta and clothe אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> 'o-Tam כֻּתֳּנֹֽת׃ <WH3801> kut-to-Not. them with coats

וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֣ <WH4886> u-ma-shach-Ta And thou shalt anoint אֹתָ֗ם <WH853> 'o-Tam, כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher you מָשַׁ֙חְתָּ֙ <WH4886> ma-Shach-ta them as thou didst anoint אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <WH1> 'a-vi-Hem, their father וְכִהֲנ֖וּ <WH3547> ve-chi-ha-Nu that they may minister unto me in the priest's office לִ֑י Li; וְ֠הָיְתָה <WH1961> Ve-ha-ye-tah will qualify לִהְיֹ֨ת <WH1961> lih-Yot will qualify לָהֶ֧ם la-Hem מָשְׁחָתָ֛ם <WH4888> ma-she-cha-Tam for their anointing לִכְהֻנַּ֥ת <WH3550> lich-hun-Nat priesthood עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> o-Lam shall surely be an everlasting לְדֹרֹתָֽם׃ <WH1755> le-do-ro-Tam throughout their generations

וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as Thus did מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh; Moses כְּ֠כֹל <WH3605> Ke-chol to all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after צִוָּ֧ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh according to all that the LORD אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> ken so עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> 'a-Sah. him so did ס sa-Mek

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> vay-Hi become בַּחֹ֧דֶשׁ <WH2320> ba-Cho-desh month הָרִאשׁ֛וֹן <WH7223> ha-ri-Shon And it came to pass in the first בַּשָּׁנָ֥ה <WH8141> bash-sha-Nah year הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <WH8145> hash-she-Nit in the second בְּאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> be-'e-Chad on the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh; [day] of the month הוּקַ֖ם <WH6965> hu-Kam was reared up הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <WH4908> ham-mish-Kan. [that] the tabernacle

וַיָּ֨קֶם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kem reared up מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמִּשְׁכָּ֗ן <WH4908> ham-mish-Kan, the tabernacle וַיִּתֵּן֙ <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten and fastened אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲדָנָ֔יו <WH134> 'a-da-Nav, his sockets וַיָּ֙שֶׂם֙ <WH7760> vai-Ya-sem and set up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קְרָשָׁ֔יו <WH7175> ke-ra-Shav, the boards וַיִּתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten thereof and put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּרִיחָ֑יו <WH1280> be-ri-Chav; in the bars וַיָּ֖קֶם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kem thereof and reared up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַמּוּדָֽיו׃ <WH5982> 'am-mu-Dav. his pillars

וַיִּפְרֹ֤שׂ <WH6566> vai-yif-Ros And he spread abroad אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאֹ֙הֶל֙ <WH168> ha-'O-hel the tent עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <WH4908> ham-mish-Kan, over the tabernacle וַיָּ֜שֶׂם <WH7760> vai-Ya-sem and put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִכְסֵ֥ה <WH4372> mich-Seh the covering הָאֹ֛הֶל <WH168> ha-'O-hel of the tent עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav over מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> mil-Ma-'e-lah; above כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh upon it as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. Moses ס sa-Mek

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach And he took וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten and put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעֵדֻת֙ <WH5715> ha-'e-Dut the testimony אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָ֣אָרֹ֔ן <WH727> ha-'a-Ron, into the ark וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <WH7760> vai-Ya-sem and set אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבַּדִּ֖ים <WH905> hab-bad-Dim the staves עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto הָאָרֹ֑ן <WH727> ha-'a-Ron; on the ark וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten and put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַכַּפֹּ֛רֶת <WH3727> hak-kap-Po-ret the mercy seat עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- of הָאָרֹ֖ן <WH727> ha-'a-Ron upon the ark מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <WH4605> mil-Ma-'e-lah. above

וַיָּבֵ֣א <WH935> vai-ya-Ve And he brought אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָרֹן֮ <WH727> ha-'a-Ron the ark אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into הַמִּשְׁכָּן֒ <WH4908> ham-mish-Kan into the tabernacle וַיָּ֗שֶׂם <WH7760> vai-Ya-sem, and set up אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et פָּרֹ֣כֶת <WH6532> pa-Ro-chet the vail הַמָּסָ֔ךְ <WH4539> ham-ma-Sach, of the covering וַיָּ֕סֶךְ <WH5526> vai-Ya-sech and covered עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al and אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark הָעֵד֑וּת <WH5715> ha-'e-Dut; of the testimony כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. Moses ס sa-Mek

וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten And he put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַשֻּׁלְחָן֙ <WH7979> hash-shul-Chan the table בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> be-'O-hel in the tent מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> mo-'Ed, of the congregation עַ֛ל <WH5921> 'al and יֶ֥רֶךְ <WH3409> Ye-rech upon the side הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> ham-mish-Kan of the tabernacle צָפֹ֑נָה <WH6828> tza-Fo-nah; northward מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> mi-Chutz without לַפָּרֹֽכֶת׃ <WH6532> lap-pa-Ro-chet. the vail

וַיַּעֲרֹ֥ךְ <WH6186> vai-ya-'a-Roch in order עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav and עֵ֥רֶךְ <WH6187> 'E-rech And he set לֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem the bread לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei upon it before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah had commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. Moses ס sa-Mek

וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <WH7760> vai-Ya-sem And he put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמְּנֹרָה֙ <WH4501> ham-me-no-Rah the candlestick בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> be-'O-hel in the tent מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> mo-'Ed, of the congregation נֹ֖כַח <WH5227> No-chach over against הַשֻּׁלְחָ֑ן <WH7979> hash-shul-Chan; the table עַ֛ל <WH5921> 'al and יֶ֥רֶךְ <WH3409> Ye-rech on the side הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> ham-mish-Kan of the tabernacle נֶֽגְבָּה׃ <WH5045> Neg-bah. southward

וַיַּ֥עַל <WH5927> vai-Ya-'al And he lighted הַנֵּרֹ֖ת <WH5216> han-ne-Rot the lamps לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. וַיָּ֛שֶׂם <WH7760> vai-Ya-sem And he put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> miz-Bach altar הַזָּהָ֖ב <WH2091> haz-za-Hav the golden בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> be-'O-hel in the tent מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> mo-'Ed; of the congregation לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lif-Nei before הַפָּרֹֽכֶת׃ <WH6532> hap-pa-Ro-chet. the vail

וַיַּקְטֵ֥ר <WH6999> vai-yak-Ter And he burnt עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav and קְטֹ֣רֶת <WH7004> ke-To-ret incense סַמִּ֑ים <WH5561> sam-Mim; sweet כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh thereon as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh.
